speakers.name: Ahmed Tikwa
speakers.title: Senior Software Engineer
speakers.bio: Senior software engineer with expertise in Android development and memory management optimization.

speakers.name: Anrich van Stryp
speakers.title: Director of Intellectual Property
speakers.bio: Director of Intellectual Property at Brits Law Inc., Member of the South African Institute of Intellectual Property, Committee Member of the Licensing Executive Society International for Trade Marks, Designs and Franchising.

speakers.name: Anselmo Alexandre
speakers.title: Android Developer
speakers.bio: Android developer at SnappMobile specializing in Kotlin development and error handling optimization.

speakers.name: Arthur Kaza
speakers.title: Data Scientist & Google Developer Expert
speakers.bio: Data Scientist with over 5 years of international experience in FinTech and risk analysis, specializing in the design and optimization of information systems, data science, and AI. Recognized as a Google Developer Expert in Machine Learning (AI) by Google for his significant contributions to AI in Google communities.

speakers.name: Fatuma Abdullahi
speakers.title: Frontend Software Developer
speakers.bio: Frontend software developer passionate about accessibility and creator of Easy Alt, an open-source VSCode extension that auto-suggests alt text for images.

speakers.name: Keorapetse Leballo
speakers.title: Software Engineer & AI Training Facilitator
speakers.bio: Dynamic software engineer and AI training facilitator with hands-on experience in full-stack development, data engineering, and learner mentorship. Currently helping to roll out the WeThinkCode GenAI training programme across South Africa.

speakers.name: Kgomotso Mahloko
speakers.title: Technology Professional
speakers.bio: Technology professional focused on the intersection of AI and software development practices.

speakers.name: Keith T. Chatsauka
speakers.title: Lawyer & Technologist
speakers.bio: Lawyer and technologist specializing in South African cyberlaw, cybersecurity, and cryptography. Focuses on the intersection of intellectual property law, compliance, and software development.

speakers.name: Lilita Xelelo
speakers.title: AI Training Facilitator & Software Developer
speakers.bio: AI Training Facilitator and Software Developer with expertise in Quality Assurance Test Automation. WeThinkCode_ Alumna passionate about equipping the next generation of tech professionals with digital and AI skills.

speakers.name: Mirembe Rebecca Peace
speakers.title: Cloud Engineer
speakers.bio: Cloud engineer with expertise in Google Cloud Platform and incident management automation.

speakers.name: Mzwandile Mhlongo
speakers.title: Senior AI/ML Engineer
speakers.bio: Senior AI/ML Engineer at Standard Bank Group with expertise in building reliable, traceable, and high-impact agentic AI systems.

speakers.name: Nhianhla Lucky Nkosi
speakers.title: Executive & Software Engineer
speakers.bio: Executive and Head of Specialised Consulting, Research and Development at BBD. Software engineer with experience in building enterprise software across banking, insurance, telecommunications and education sectors. Educator and co-organizer of Jozi.JS meetup.

speakers.name: Rodgers Ndocha
speakers.title: AI & Cloud Expert
speakers.bio: Seasoned AI expert and cloud innovator with passion for leveraging technology to solve complex problems and drive innovation. Specializes in AI agent development and cloud deployment.

speakers.name: Simphiwe Radebe
speakers.title: Mobile Developer
speakers.bio: Mobile developer specializing in Android and Flutter development with expertise in secure, scalable AI chat applications and cloud integration.

speakers.name: Sylvia Dieckmann
speakers.title: Senior Software Engineer & Google Developer Expert
speakers.bio: Senior software engineer and engineering manager with expertise in Flutter, Firebase, and mobile app development. Google Developer Expert for Flutter/Dart with interest in exploring new technologies in mobile apps and web technologies.

speakers.name: Thabang Ledwaba
speakers.title: AI Business Strategist
speakers.bio: AI business strategist focused on helping organizations make responsible AI investments and avoid the pitfalls of AI hype cycles.

speakers.name: Dida Copiso
speakers.title: Master of Ceremonies
speakers.bio: Experienced MC and event host for technology conferences and community events.

speakers.name: Nick
speakers.title: Panelist
speakers.bio: Technology professional and panelist specializing in cloud technologies and AI business applications.

speakers.name: Mpumi Hlomuka-Berman
speakers.title: Cloud Expert
speakers.bio: Cloud technology expert and moderator with Google Cloud, specializing in cloud infrastructure and AI solutions.

speakers.name: Cloudsmiths
speakers.title: Recruitment Specialists
speakers.bio: Technology recruitment specialists focused on connecting organizations with top tech talent in the age of AI.

sessions.title: KEYNOTE
sessions.description: Opening keynote address for DevFest Johannesburg 2025

sessions.title: Intellectual Property in the Development Space
sessions.description: The legal implications and requirements for successful IP protection in development

sessions.title: Bring your AI Agents Online: ADK + Google Cloud Run + Custom Domains
sessions.description: Complete workflow of building and deploying AI agents using Google's Agent Development Kit with cloud-native deployment and domain integration

sessions.title: Web APIs You Should Be Using in 2025: Unlocking Next-Level Web Experiences
sessions.description: Explore newest and most underutilized browser APIs including File System Access API, Background Fetch API, WebGPU, Web Share API Level 2, and Contacts Picker API

sessions.title: From Device to Cloud: Safe and Scalable AI Chat on Android
sessions.description: Design applications that are safe, secure, and scalable by integrating modern mobile practices with cloud and AI technologies

sessions.title: Panel Discussion
sessions.description: Expert panel discussion on cloud technologies and AI applications

sessions.title: The Cost of AI FOMO: How Hype is Burning Businesses
sessions.description: Exploring why executives fall into the hype trap, showcasing real-world examples of failed AI adoption, and sharing practical frameworks for evaluating AI investments responsibly

sessions.title: A Deep Dive into WineSom, an Agentic Flutter App
sessions.description: Exploring what makes a Flutter application agentic through the example of WineSom, leveraging firebase_ai interface for dynamic, context-aware multi-turn chat conversations

sessions.title: Building an Incident Management Assistant on GCP
sessions.description: Step-by-step demo on how to manage incident logs with cloud monitoring, using vertex ai to assess problems and provide solutions

sessions.title: Coming Back to Code: How AI Is Changing the Way We Build
sessions.description: A candid guide to returning to codeâ€”where AI helps, where judgement matters, and how to co-pilot wisely

sessions.title: Scaling Agentic AI: Building Reliable, Traceable, and High-Impact Systems
sessions.description: Best practices for designing agent workflows, orchestrating tools, and preventing failure modes in agentic AI systems

sessions.title: Automating Alt Text with Generative AI (Easy Alt VSCode Extension)
sessions.description: Creating accessible web experiences with Easy Alt, an open-source VSCode extension that auto-suggests alt text for images

sessions.title: Building a Tiny AI Model (Smaller, Smarter and Local): How Far Can You Go with <600MB?
sessions.description: Exploring how compact large language models can be transformed into practical, local-first assistants that run smoothly on standard laptops

sessions.title: Your First AI Teammate: Build and Deploy an Autonomous Agent with Cloud Run
sessions.description: Building and deploying autonomous AI agents using cloud technologies

sessions.title: Navigating the SA Legal & Cyber Landscape from SDLC to EOL
sessions.description: Practical legal roadmap for the entire software development lifecycle covering South African IP law, cyberlaw, compliance, and cybersecurity

sessions.title: Recruitment in the age of AI
sessions.description: Exploring how AI is transforming technology recruitment and talent acquisition

sessions.title: The Silent Crash: Is Your App Ready for Android's 16KB Memory Shift?
sessions.description: Practical guide to preparing for Android's move to 16KB page size, analyzing real-world crashes and providing actionable roadmap for testing and debugging

sessions.title: Kotlin Rich Errors: Transforming Errors into Actionable Project Insights
sessions.description: Creating rich error models in Kotlin that carry context and transforming errors into insights for development processes

sessions.title: WTC AI Masterclass
sessions.description: Exploring strides Generative AI has made in software development with interactive Q&A, project demonstration showcasing practical use of Large Language Models

events.name: GDG DevFest Johannesburg 2025
events.description: Join us for DevFest Johannesburg 2025 - Building Safe, Secure, and Scalable Solutions with AI and Cloud. A full day of talks, workshops, and networking with fellow developers in the Google Developer Group community.
